Q18N. Summary Table: What impact, if any, do you think the rising cost of living will have on demand for the following community-based support services in your local community?
Debt advice and support (e.g. Citizens Advice)
Local victim support charities (e.g. women's shelters)
Free arts, culture or leisure (e.g. libraries, local museums, Parkrun).
